  • Note
    To enable the login screen on startup, change the enabled entry in login in conf/config.json to true, and to disable it, change it to false.

    "login": {

    "enabled" : true,
    "heading" : "Login",
    "fields": [
    {
    "name": "username",
    "label": "Username",
    "type": "text"
    },
    {
    "name": "password",
    "label": "Password",
    "type": "password"
    }
    ]

    },
